      • BookingManager

        public BookingManager()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructor for the booking manager. This will assign the hashmaps for the bookings and client lists, and add the rooms to an array list from the addRooms() method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • addRooms

        public java.util.ArrayList<Room> addRooms()
        A method to add rooms to the roomsList ArrayList.
        Returns:
        roomsList - An array list which holds the information on the rooms that are available to book.

      • createBooking

        public void createBooking(int noOfComputers,
                          BookingManager.Timeslot timeslot,
                          java.time.LocalDate bookingDate,
                          Client client)
        The method that is called from the interface to create a booking. The booking will find attempt to find the room which suits the booking determined by the amount of computers required. If a room is found then a booking will be created using a client, room, time slot, id and date.
        Parameters:
        noOfComputers - - The entered amount of computers which the user has asked for
        startTime - - The start time determined by the timeslot the user has chosen.
        bookingDate - - The date that was picked by the user, using the DatePicker.
        client - - The client that made the booking

      • findRoom

        public Room findRoom(int noOfComputers,
                     java.time.LocalDate date,
                     BookingManager.Timeslot timeslot)
              throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        The method which finds the room to return to the createBooking() method. It will use an ArrayList which will consist of the list of rooms. That ArrayList will them be filtered first by the amount of computers each room has, and the required amount of computers, then the rooms will be checked to see if those rooms have been booked on that date & time slot. The rooms that have been booked, or don't meet the required amount of computers will be removed from the filteredList. The filteredList will then be sorted and the room which best fits will be returned.
        Parameters:
        noOfComputers - - Number of computers required in the booking
        date - - Date of the booking
        timeslot - - Time slot which holds start and end times for the requested booking
        Returns:
        - The room that meets the requirements with the lowest wasted space.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • createClient

        public void createClient(java.lang.String clientName,
                         java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                         java.lang.String emailAddress)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        A method that will create a client using an overloaded method. If there is not a phone number entered then it will use the first method to create a client. If there is a phone number it will use the second. There is also an id counter which adds an ID to the hash map for clients.
        Parameters:
        clientName - - the name entered for the client
        phoneNumber - - the phone number entered for the client (not mandatory)
        emailAddress - - the email address entered for the client
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

        A short method to cancel a booking by taking in the id of a booking that is being cancelled.
        Parameters:
        bookingId -
        Returns:

      • getClients

        public Client[] getClients()
        A method to return an array of clients which is used in the interface for a client drop-down.
        Returns:
        an array of clients from the ArrayList

      • getBookings

        public Booking[] getBookings()
        A method that returns the current bookings. Used in the interface to show the bookings.
        Returns:
        an array of bookings from the bookingsList ArrayList

      • loadClientRecords

        public void loadClientRecords()
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        A method which uses serialisation to load the clients from file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • saveRecords

        public void saveRecords()
        A method which called the saveBooking() and loadBooking() methods in the interface. This is to allow the saving and loading to be private.
